title: The Golden Sayings of Epictetus - LXV
author: Unknown
content:
When a youth was giving himself airs in the Theatre and
saying, “I am wise, for I have conversed with many wise men,"
Epictetus replied, “I too have conversed with many rich men, yet
I am not rich!”

This complete text of The Golden Sayings of Epictetus is in the public domain.


Also see Epictetus: A Stoic and Socratic Guide to Life
by A. A. Long.


This page has been created by Philipp Lenssen.

Page last updated on April 2003.
